message: Starting review - gathering phase handover and agent findings
Found 4 completed agents with question files. Verifying actual deliverables: Week 6 (18q), Week 7 (19q), Week 8 (18q), Week 9 (18q) = 73 total. Now checking file quality.

Verified all 4 question files. Week 6: 18q, Week 7: 20q, Week 8: 18q, Week 9: 18q = 74 total questions. All follow correct JSON format with comprehensive explanations. Checking difficulty distribution and topic coverage now.

Review completed and verdict submitted: APPROVED. Verified all 4 deliverables (74 total questions), checked JSON format compliance, validated difficulty distribution, confirmed comprehensive topic coverage, and assessed explanation quality. All phase success criteria met.
